name: Auto Race War Gangsters 3D Multiplayer FREE - By Dead Cool Apps
name_original: Auto Race War Gangsters 3D Multiplayer FREE - By Dead Cool Apps
description:
"Choose Your Ride - Race to The Death!"

That's your mission, so pick your vehicle, location, soundtrack and get going Boss!

You have three minutes per Race War, to out perform your rival racers and be victorious. Get to it!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

- Eight Vehicles to Choose From
- Five Unique racing locations
- A Choice of Seven Sound Tracks
- Real Time Multiplayer via Nextpeer
- Replay and Share your Epic Win with Video Replays

Download NOW! 100% FREE...
